TextBlock.Text: OKALIS: With our current goal of destroying the dangerous node, I cannot help but wonder what will happen when the node dies?
NESIA: I would imagine it will be similar to when the node leading from <color=orange>Shattered Hearth</color> to here perished, and it will simply re-link to somewhere else.

OKALIS: Perhaps, but this area already had an additional entrance in the <color=orange>Nursery</color>. What if the area the dangerous node leads to does not have any other entrances? Will the area itself die and be cut off?
NESIA: Hm, a fair point. I suppose we shall see. Perhaps the pocket dimension will collapse entirely, ejecting any objects inside?
OKALIS: That would be interesting! I only hope that, if that is the case, there isn't anything inside causing the apparent peril.
